name: builder_app
author: Jaroost
//: Postinstall script: Run after npm install (install the definitions for typescript)
debug.server script: Run server/server.ts in debug mode with node-inspector
gulp-util to have to utily in gulp taks (beep, log, ...)
node-inspector to debug express server applications
ts-node and typescript must be install for compiling typescripts files
typings installs typescript type definitions in the folder typings
the command typings install all the required definitions for typescript for this project
